title: human race, the
comment: Human beings are the high point of God's creation. They alone are created in his image. As a result of sin they are alienated from God and from one another, and are unable by themselves to alter this situation. The salvation of humanity rests totally upon the atoning sacrifice of Jesus Christ, received by grace through faith.

children.title: human race, and creation
children.comment: Although the human race is the pinnacle of God's creative work, it shares the inherent limitations of the physical realm. Human beings are nevertheless given responsibility to manage and steward the world.

children.title: The human race is an integral part of the physical creation
The human race was created from the ground

primaryrefs.comment: The Hebrew word for man, ``adam'' sounds like the Hebrew word for ground ``adamah''.

children.title: The human race was created on the same day as the animals
The human race was created from dust like the animals
The human race is set apart from the rest of creation
The human race is uniquely created in God's image
The human race is given authority to take care of creation
The human race is created with the power of choice
Human beings are created accountable to God for their actions
The human race is created dependent upon God
The human race comprises two complementary genders
The human race is one entity with a common ancestry in Adam
human race, and God
children.comment: Though vastly superior to the human race, God nevertheless loves, sustains and governs it, sending his Son as a human being to redeem humanity.

children.title: God is incomparably superior to the human race
The human race is dependent upon God
The human race is valued and loved by God
The human race is the object of God's care and compassion
God wants to bless the human race
God wants to save the human race
God highly values the human race and human life
God is sovereign and watches over the human race
God will judge and punish the wickedness of the human race
God is to be feared and worshipped by the entire human race
human race, and sin
children.comment: As a result of the fall, human beings have become separated from God through sin, and are divided amongst themselves. All are in a condition of spiritual blindness, slavery and death, and are incapable of saving themselves from this situation.

children.title: All the human race is sinful

seealsos.comment: Babylon symbolises human society which in its opposition to God has become thoroughly corrupt.

children.title: The human race is estranged from God
The human race is spiritually callous, blind, enslaved and dead
The human race is divided
The human race is divided individual against individual
The human race is divided man against woman
The human race is divided nation against nation
The human race is divided Jew against Gentile
The human race is divided rich against poor
The human race has been weakened by sin
The human race has become subject to death
Human beings have become weak and frail
human race, and redemption
children.comment: Through Jesus Christ's death on the cross and his redemption, human beings are offered a salvation that will give them spiritual life and freedom, reconcile them to God, and unite them to one another as part of a new humanity.

children.title: Salvation is offered to the human race through Jesus Christ
The Saviour was himself a human being
The human race is reconciled to God through Jesus Christ's death on the cross
The human race is united in Jesus Christ
The human race is renewed in Jesus Christ
In Jesus Christ the human race is given spiritual life and freedom
human race, destiny of
children.comment: All human beings must face judgment, when God will reward them according to their attitude towards him.

children.title: The human race will face final judgment
Unbelievers will be separated from God
Those who have faith will live in God's presence
United in the praise of God
Delivered from suffering, pain and death
Sharing in the glory of Jesus Christ
